mapper.select: SELECT A.*, IFNULL(M.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM article WHERE 1
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT A.*, IFNULL(M.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer FROM article AS A LEFT JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE 1
AND A.boardId = #{boardId}
AND A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (A.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR A.`body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{limitTake}
